description: Quartz and Marketplace look at how the Cuban economy has changed in the last few years.
contentencoded: This week, Actuality goes to Cuba. We'll hear how the U.S. decision to re-open relations is affecting the island nation — in its music, its growing private sector and its underground internet. Plus, a virtual visit to a coral reef.
tags: Actuality: A podcast from Marketplace and Quartz
teaser: Quartz and Marketplace look at how the Cuban economy has changed in the last few years.
title: PODCAST: Cuba Libre
